A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This felt more like an Episode of Battlestar Galactica than it did a Star Wars movie. There are multiple points in the movie The force is not used in anyway consistent with the way it was used in the previous movies or even the cartoons. As bad as the prequel trilogy was\, at least the story felt like it was a Star Wars story\, this movie doesn't feel like it belongs at all.
